subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi surpassed Pelé’s milestone of 75 goals in a calendar year, scoring for the 75th and 76th times in 2012 to lead Barcelona to a 4-2 victory at Mallorca.
snippet: Lionel Messi surpassed Pelé’s milestone of 75 goals in a calendar year, scoring for the 75th and 76th times in 2012 to lead Barcelona to a 4-2 victory at Mallorca.
